parameters.label: Camera Zoom
parameters.infoText: How far to zoom the camera in. Higher values zoom the camera in more. Set to 0 to reset the zoom to default.

parameters.label: Time
parameters.infoText: How long it takes for the camera to fully zoom.

parameters.label: Time Unit
parameters.infoText: The unit of measurement that should be used for the Time parameter.

parameters.label: Mode
parameters.infoText: Whether the value should be the exact zoom, the zoom relative to the stage's default, the zoom multiplied by the stage's default, or the zoom compared to the current zoom when the event occurs.

parameters.label: Ease
parameters.infoText: The type of transition to use for the tween.
